item.description:
Kicking off our monthly RPGA day at the Doric Masonic Center with the first core adventure!

Inheritance

When the Netherese conquered Sembia those who objected were either killed or forced to flee. Decades later a young man inherits a key to the family vault abandoned seventy years earlier. Desperate for money he hires you to retrieve it contents in a gamble that something worthwhile is still there. A Living Forgotten Realms adventure set in Sembia for characters levels 1-4.

If you want to create a character feel free to show up early, or use the guidelines on the RPGA site to create one before hand! I have RPGA membership cards for anyone who needs one, there will be punch and chips to snack on as well.
item.name: Living Forgotten Realms Game Day 01
